Fixing Unworking Info Button
----------------------------
Programs need:
WinRAR
Nero Burning ROM
----------------------------
1. Unrar bf1942_full_exp_dvd.iso to folder BF1942_DVD
2. Open BF1942_DVD\Autorun\BFAutorun.ini
3. Find line Label11 change run(info.txt) to run(..\EXTRAS\info.txt). Do same with Label12.
4. Move BF1942_DVD\Autorun\info.txt to BF1942_DVD\EXTRAS\
5. Open Nero Burning ROM.
5. Make New DVD-ROM (ISO)
   -No Multisession
   -Label BF1942_DVD
6. Add all files from BF1942_DVD folder.
7. Burn or Choose Recorder - Image Recorder and save image file as *.nrg or *.iso.

Mintykanesh:

you need a no-cd exe. first check your directory from the game dvd(when you mount the image, itll appear in your computer, right click, and explore), look for a folder along the lines of "crack" or just a folder that doesnt look like it should be there.  after that, just pretty much copy it, and paste it into your game folder. when it says it already exists, just hit yes to all.

if there is no no-cd exe crack in there, well... there should be, but if there isnt.

go to http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/battlefield1942.shtml
and download the nocd exe for the version of the game you have.

and repeat the steps above.
